bill.title: Real estate broker's price opinion; provide regulation of.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 73-34-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Real Estate Appraiser Licensing And Certification Act Shall Not Apply To Real Estate Licensees Who Are On Active Status And Who Perform A Broker Price Opinion; To Amend Section 73-35-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Define The Terms "automated Valuation Model" And "broker Price Opinion" As Used In The Real Estate Brokers License Law; To Create A New Section To Be Codified Within Chapter 35, Title 73, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For The Requirements And Regulations Of A Broker's Price Opinion; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Business and Financial Institutions
